description: [Raspberry Robin](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1130) will execute its payload prior to initializing command and control traffic by impersonating one of several legitimate program names such as dllhost.exe, regsvr32.exe, or rundll32.exe.(Citation: TrendMicro RaspberryRobin 2022)

external_references.description: Christopher So. (2022, December 20). Raspberry Robin Malware Targets Telecom, Governments. Retrieved May 17, 2024.
